Package BusinessLayer

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.MenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseProducts, CompositeProduct
public abstract class MenuItem extends Object implements Serializable
In this class, the data corresponding the products will be saved and the operations for products will be implemented
See Also:
Serialized Form
